## ExifSceneCaptureType enumeration

exif 场景捕获类型枚举。

```csharp
public enum ExifSceneCaptureType
```

### 价值观

| 姓名 | 价值 | 描述 |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Standard | `0` | 标准场景。 |
| Landscape | `1` | 风景场景. |
| Portrait | `2` | 人像场景。 |
| NightScene | `3` | 夜景。 |
